net.openhft.chronicle.map

Class MapEventListener<K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.map.MapEventListener<K,V,M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class MapEventListener<K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This event listener is called when key events occur.

    All these calls are synchronous while a lock is held so make them as quick as possible

    TODO specify more clearly in which cases methods are called.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGetFound(M map, net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry, int metaDataBytes, K key, V value)
      This method is called if a value is found in the map.
      V onGetMissing(M map, net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes keyBytes, K key, V usingValue)
      This is called when there was no existing entry for a key.
      void onPut(M map, net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry, int metaDataBytes, boolean added, K key, V value)
      This method is called if a key/value is put in the map.
      void onRemove(M map, net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry, int metaDataBytes, K key, V value)
      This is called when an entry is removed.

        public MapEventListener()

    • Method Detail

      • onGetMissing

        public V onGetMissing(M map,
                      net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes keyBytes,
                      K key,
                      V usingValue)
        This is called when there was no existing entry for a key. Optionally you can provide a value to add to the map.
        Parameters:
        map - accessed
        keyBytes - bytes of the key looked up
        key - object used as key
        usingValue - value provided to reuse, could be null.
        Returns:
        null if null should be returned, or a value to put in the map and return.

      • onGetFound

        public void onGetFound(M map,
                       net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry,
                       int metaDataBytes,
                       K key,
                       V value)
        This method is called if a value is found in the map.
        Parameters:
        map - accessed
        entry - bytes of the entry
        metaDataBytes - length of meta data for this map.
        key - looked up
        value - found

      • onPut

        public void onPut(M map,
                  net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry,
                  int metaDataBytes,
                  boolean added,
                  K key,
                  V value)
        This method is called if a key/value is put in the map.
        Parameters:
        map - accessed
        entry - added/modified
        metaDataBytes - length of the meta data
        added - if this is a new entry
        key - looked up
        value - set for key

      • onRemove

        public void onRemove(M map,
                     net.openhft.lang.io.Bytes entry,
                     int metaDataBytes,
                     K key,
                     V value)
        This is called when an entry is removed. Misses are not notified.
        Parameters:
        map - accessed
        entry - removed
        metaDataBytes - length of meta data
        key - removed
        value - removed
